snippet.title: Dead Hand: Clearing the twin C-RAM systems (v1.14, Hard, Tankette)
snippet.description:
Unedited playthrough of the first three levels of Dead Hand, the tactical roguelike, on Hard difficulty.

Get Dead Hand on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1117480/Dead_Hand/

Had a couple of rough moments along  the way but the boss fight itself was relatively straightforward, since it was easy to line the two turrets up so one would hit the other, their entourage wasn't as dangerous as it could have been, and I was packing enough 7.62mm and 5.56mm AP ammo to get the job done. Sometimes RNGesus giveth, sometimes RNGesus taketh away.
